name: GeoWar
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

Arrow Keys - Shoot

This game is a roguelike top-down shooter. You are aiming to infect a system with a virus and must defeat "The Ankh" a mighty antivirus along with his minions of protection. Multiple floors, hundreds of room possibilities and unique items!

The game is nowhere near a finished project, there are a few known bugs I'm working on for a post-jam release.

Known bugs:

- [Fixed in post-jam version] Enemies moving to the player beyond their designated room, results in player being hit and/or dying on room entry

- [Fixed in post-jam version] Enemies can push you out of the rooms, making re-entering basically impossible
